name: Night Maze
description:
Night maze is a project born from the second edition of the EMMI GameJam organized in January 2020. The teams were composed of MMI students and students from the Enseirb Matmeca of Bordeaux.

The imposed subject: "EMMI et une nuit".
After a long search for ideas and concepts we decided to make a simple game that could be playable at the end of the 48 hours imposed. 
We decided to make a one-on-one shooter-type mini-game! The theme "Emmi and a night" inspired us to create a world of mystery where light is both precious and devastating.
